title: The Adventures of Nathaniel and Isabel
description: Based on the classic children’s book, orphan siblings Nathaniel and Isabel go on adventures and escape the grasp of the evil Nurse Caterwaul.
altHero: a young girl (Isabel) and her bespectacled younger brother (Nathaniel) on a desert island look into the distance
alt1: Nathaniel prays over the body of an unconscious Isabel
alt2: Isabel’s hand with a glowing teardrop
alt3: Nathaniel and Isabel see a sailing ship approach the island
alt4: the evil looking Nurse Caterwaul is on the ship
